Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface FlipFitSlotBookingDAOInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
FlipFitSlotBookingDAOImpl
public interface FlipFitSlotBookingDAOInterface
Interface for FlipFit Slot Booking Data Access Object (DAO) operations. Provides methods to manage slot bookings and payments for gym centres.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addBooking(FlipFitSlotBooking booking)
    Adds a new booking to the system.
    boolean
    addPayment(FlipFitPayments payment)
    Adds a payment record for a booking.
    List<FlipFitSlotBooking>
    getAllBookingsByGymIdAndDate(String gymId, LocalDate date)
    Retrieves all bookings for a specific gym on a particular date.
    int
    getBookingCountBySlotId(String slotId)
    Retrieves the number of bookings for a specific slot.
    List<FlipFitSlotBooking>
    listBookingsByUserId(String userId)
    Lists all bookings made by a specific user.
    void
    removeBooking(String bookingId)
    Removes an existing booking from the system.

  • Method Details

    • getBookingCountBySlotId

      int getBookingCountBySlotId(String slotId) throws InvalidSlotException
      Retrieves the number of bookings for a specific slot.
      Parameters:
      slotId - The ID of the slot to check.
      Returns:
      The number of bookings for the specified slot.
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotException - If the slot ID is invalid or not found.

    • addBooking

      void addBooking(FlipFitSlotBooking booking) throws InvalidSlotException, GymSlotSeatLimitReachedException
      Adds a new booking to the system.
      Parameters:
      booking - The FlipFitSlotBooking object representing the booking to be added.
      Throws:
      InvalidSlotException - If the slot ID is invalid or not found.
      GymSlotSeatLimitReachedException - If the slot has reached its maximum seat limit.

    • addPayment

      boolean addPayment(FlipFitPayments payment)
      Adds a payment record for a booking.
      Parameters:
      payment - The FlipFitPayments object representing the payment to be added.
      Returns:
      true if the payment is added successfully, false otherwise.

    • removeBooking

      void removeBooking(String bookingId) throws InvalidBookingException
      Removes an existing booking from the system.
      Parameters:
      bookingId - The ID of the booking to be removed.
      Throws:
      InvalidBookingException - If the booking ID is invalid or not found.

    • listBookingsByUserId

      List<FlipFitSlotBooking> listBookingsByUserId(String userId)
      Lists all bookings made by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user whose bookings are to be listed.
      Returns:
      A List of FlipFitSlotBooking objects representing the user's bookings.

    • getAllBookingsByGymIdAndDate

      List<FlipFitSlotBooking> getAllBookingsByGymIdAndDate(String gymId, LocalDate date)
      Retrieves all bookings for a specific gym on a particular date.
      Parameters:
      gymId - The ID of the gym whose bookings are to be retrieved.
      date - The date on which to retrieve the bookings.
      Returns:
      A List of FlipFitSlotBooking objects representing the bookings for the gym on the specified date.
